39387018.review:
A time-management linear city-building game where unlike the usual, instead of building a strong economy, you somewhat rely on randomly generated resources.

If you don’t like the genre, this is not something what will change your mind, otherwise it’s entirely serviceable game which works perfectly in UHD UWS Surround.

It looks pleasant, even if generic. The writing tries to emulate the writing of translations of the Homer. Narratively it’s either broken or is a “deconstruction” (judging by the hammock) — it’s not 12 and it’s not Hercules’ labours. It’s like the legend of 300 spartans — most of the work is done by servants.

If you want one — it is one.

39319511.review: Sehr schönes kleines spiel für zwischendurch.

39293668.review:
12 Labours of Hercules is the kind of game that's promoted as casual, but I can tell you that's not a fair assessment. It's the perfect game to play when you have only a little time, but it will also keep you awake at night. It doesn't have amazing graphics or some powerful story. It's just addictive, fun, and that's pretty much all that matters.
Hercules brings us FUN! 
A great game, fantastic graphics, and great gameplay! Loads of achievements, some easy, some more difficult to achieve. I played both on relaxed as on expert level, and both are good. On relaxed it's really easy to get gold on every level, and well, on expert... not so easy :) and the levels take longer the further you get into the game. So still lots of hours of fun to have! 
Try it, I'm sure you'll love it!! Enjoy!

39266195.review: Simpático juego de gestión de tiempo basado en los trabajos de Hércules. Tiene una demo con 10 niveles que te dan una buena idea de lo que es el juego. La versión completa son 40 niveles, fáciles de pasar en oro en dificultad normal. Me ha gustado y aproveché las ofertas para comprar toda la saga

39193477.review:
[h1][b]Análise feita em parceria com [url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/JCAGamer]JCAGamer[/url].[/b][/h1]

Visitem o link abaixo para saber mais e também saberem como são feitas as nossas análises.

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/cantaliceworldgames/discussions/4/1620600279673447041/]Nossas Análises[/url]

[h1][b]VAMOS AO JOGO![/b][/h1]

Primeiro jogo da franquia 12 Labours of Hercules e um excelente passa tempo com um estilo de gerenciamento de tempo. Vale com certeza conferir. Diversão garantida.

[h1][b]=> Proposta[/b][/h1]

12 Labours of Hercules ou na sua tradução, Os 12 Trabalhos de Hércules, é um jogo desenvolvido pela Zoom Out Games e distribuído pela JetDogs Studios.

Lançado inicialmente em 2013 no Big Fish Games, o jogo logo se destacou dentre os vários jogos no estilo de gerenciamento de tempo/estratégia/puzzle, sendo relançado na Steam no ano de 2015.

O jogo tem como narrativa de fundo os 12 trabalhos realizados por Hércules a serviço de Euristeu (representante de Hera). Sempre enviado para matar, subjugar ou buscar uma planta ou animal mágico. Hércules com grande bravura e determinação cumpriu todos os trabalhos com êxito.

[h1][b]=> História[/b][/h1]

Neste primeiro jogo o nosso bravo e destemido herói, Hércules, tem a tarefa de resgatar sua esposa Mégara depois de ser raptada por Hades e levada ao seu domínio no submundo.

No percusso você enfrentará e derrotará a Hidra, em retratação a um dos doze trabalhos realizados pelo herói e também ficará frente a frente com Cérbero (um monstruoso cão de três cabeças que guardava a entrada do mundo inferior).

Em processo você ainda ajudará Prometheus e Quíron, o Centauro. Contará também com a ajuda de seus fiéis servos que realizam quase todo o trabalho e a medusa que também dará as caras nesta aventura.

[h1][b]=> Jogabilidade[/b][/h1]

Com uma jogabilidade simples e intuitiva você deve dar ordens aos seus personagens clicando nas tarefas como coletar suprimentos, cortar madeira, consertar pontes, chutar pedras, dentre várias outras ações como até mesmo desferir golpes em inimigos a espreitas.

Você pode acumular até 3 ordens em sequência que seus personagens executarão suas tarefas.

Existe também a possibilidade de ativar vários bônus, como parar o tempo, acelerar a velocidade que seus personagens concluem suas tarefas e coletam recursos, conceder mais um servo ao serviço e também aumentar a quantidade dos recursos coletados.

[h1][b]=> Gráficos[/b][/h1]

Os gráficos são bem legais e atrai a atenção com o traçado estilo cartoon (Desenho).

Com menus e HUD também atrativos similares aos vários jogos lançados em mobile ou navegadores.

Os personagens foram desenhos com o intuito de serem carismáticos e eles conseguem passar isso. É legal ver graficamente os servos, o próprio Hércules, ou até mesmo os chefões executarem suas ações.

Você gostará de ver nosso herói Hércules adentrar vários cenários como florestas, montanhas, praias e o submundo.

[h1][b]=> Sons[/b][/h1]

A trilha sonora deste jogo é bem agradável e você gostará de ouvir por um bom tempo, apesar de não existir muita variedade.

Mas sempre há toques legais de BGM e trilhas que demonstram a situação atual que se passa no jogo, como nos cenários dos chefões.

[h1][b]=> Para o 100% do jogo[/b][/h1]

Para o quesito 100%, o jogo é um ótimo pedido para aqueles, assim como nós, caçadores de conquistas.

Sem muita dificuldade e com um curto período de jogatina, você conseguirá concluir o jogo com um 100% e somar mais um jogo a sua coleção de jogos perfeitos aqui na Steam.

[h1][b]=> Recursos[/b][/h1]

Excelente preço / Benefício.

O jogo possui conquistas, cartas, emoticons e backgrounds para colecionar aqui na steam e incrementar seu perfil de usuário.

============================================

[h1][b]Conclusão[/b][/h1]

> 12 Labours of Hercules é sem dúvida um jogo BBB (Bom, Bonito e Barato).
> Ideal para jogadores casuais devido a sua simplicidade e dificuldade baixa.
> Ótimo passa tempo para aqueles que estão entediados ou não desejam se aventurar em jogos mais complexos.
> Preço agradável e vale mesmo em valor original, mas que facilmente entra em promoção, então aguarde uma Sale caso não queira gastar muito.

[h1][b]Recomendado! Não pode faltar em sua biblioteca de jogos.[/b][/h1]

[h1][b]Recomendado! Não pode faltar em sua biblioteca de jogos.[/b][/h1]

39115394.review: Dużo satysfakcji z przechodzenia świetnie przygotowanch poziomów i zodobywaniu osiągnięć- przy czym gra nie wymaga od nas wielkiego poświęcenia czasu. Dobra gra po ciężkim dniu.

39084604.review:
12 Labors of Hercules is a nice relaxing game, personally I played it every day 30 minutes before going to work on a PC. The game is also available in a mobile form.
Do not think that the game is tedious and boring, absolutely not, we have a large map on which Hercules (the main character) and his helpers, ie Pegasus, Cerberus, Cyclops and Medusa, move.
In this game we collect supplies of food and building materials from which we build sawmills, farms and warehouses needed to produce raw materials and collect them.
Each level presents us with various challenges such as finding a hidden piece of the puzzle, completing the level at a given time.
The creators offered us various bonuses to facilitate the passage of a given level in the so-called "Golden Time", we have bonuses such as: fast building, fast moving, horn abundance (doubles the number of items to collect) additional employee and stop time in the hourglass.
We also meet several beasts from Greek mythology.
On each map there are various obstacles ahead of us, for example, we repair bridges and roads, we "patch" holes to unlock access to new heroes or resources of raw materials and places to build farm buildings.
There is a great diversity in terms of levels and opponents or our helpers.
I definitely recommend the game because I played great.

Advantages:
Heroes and beasts from Greek myths
A variety of beings and levels.
Very nice and pleasant graphics.
Pleasant music
A great time killer.

Disadvantages:
Short.

In summary, I recommend it as an excellent time killer who does not irritate.

38997139.review:
Has easy achievemnts & cards. Simple enough gameplay. $3 isn't that bad a price, when it's on sale for under a buck is even better.
I enjoyed it, but couldn't do it all in one sitting. Little bit monotonous. To think there are six of these on Steam so far...

38899539.review:
A must have if on sale, an OK addition if you can buy it at regular.

One of these games that you sit down and you just want to finish - easy, simple, intuitive. Great if you want to talk a bit more about the Greek Mythology with kids.

38776736.review:
Bom jogo casual para PC FRACO e bom para passar o tempo! 
Recomendo.

38720055.review:
I didn't really know what this game was about when I first purchased. I mean, I've seen the graphics and some of the gameplay footage, and since the price was so attractive, I decided to give it a go. Well, but what is it about?

You take control over Hercules, his minions and also some other mythical creatures, and you need to fulfill certain goals in order to advance to the next level. There's a time limit going on, which has a direct influence on your score, and throughout the way you can also unlock some special powers that will provide you some assistance during your quest.

There's not really much of a story, I mean, it's nothing complex and I think it suits this premise really well, after all, we're talking about a casual game. The graphics are nice, the sound effects are ok, the soundtrack gets boring after a while, but at least for me it didn't make much difference, as I was usually focused on what I had to do on each level. As for the gameplay, I'd say that it's a blend of strategy and management, as you need to build improvements and also collect resources along the way.

The game itself isn't very difficult, you can surely unlock every single achievement available without having a headache. Anyway, if you decide to give this game a try, I only advise you to take it easy, as binging can turn your experience into something really tedious.

Overall, it's a fun game and if you enjoy it, there're some other titles of this series available here on Steam for a very affordable price.

38675399.review: 不是很有意思，跟10年前玩过的美女餐厅很像。点点点就行了。

38622751.review:

Very simple to ick up and play and a good time waster.
Colect items, build roads, fix bridges etc...
Nothing taxing or deep, but for a couple of pence worth a play.

39494746.review: Классная игра! Рекомендую к покупке, особенно если есть скидка! Красочная и интересная с русской локализацией, интересными достижениями и сюжетом)

39474697.review: This game has advertisements.  That nets an immediate bad review from me right from the get-go.  I paid for this this, it isn't a cell phone download.

39471618.review: What's the game? No idea. Cards!

39471558.review:
[h1]🎮 [u]12 Labours of Hercules[/u] 🎮[/h1]

Mit 12 Labours of Hercules startete [url=http://store.steampowered.com/search/?developer=Jetdogs%20Studios]Jetdogs Studio[/url] in Kooperation mit [url=http://store.steampowered.com/search/?developer=Zoom%20Out%20Games]Zoom Out Games[/url] eine mittlerweile [url=http://store.steampowered.com/bundle/5893/12_Labours_of_Hercules_7in1_Bundle/]sieben Teile[/url] umfassende Reihe. Ursprünglich für iOS und Android als Zeitmanagement-Gelegenheitsspiel konzipiert, portierte man das Spiel aufgrund des Erfolgs 2015 auch auf den PC und Steam. 

[b]Gameplay[/b]

Die Story ist recht schnell erzählt: Hercules muss seine von Hades entführte Ehefrau Helena retten und macht sich auf den 40 Level umfassenden, gefährlichen und beschwerlichen Weg. Dieser wird immer wieder durch kleine, liebevoll gestaltete Filmsequenzen unterbrochen, sodass die Story weitererzählt werden kann. Das Anschauen lohnt sich tatsächlich! In den Leveln selbst muss man dann als Spieler unter Zeitdruck Aufgaben bewältigen für welche man mit seinen Arbeitern Ressourcen absammelt oder Hindernisse aus dem Weg räumt. Hier weist das Spiel einen Point & Click Charakter auf. 

Grafisch ist das Ganze in 2D gehalten und die pummelig anmutenden Figuren wirken süß, ja fast schon niedlich. Musikalisch wartet das Spiel mit Lautenmusik und Glockenspiel auf, also eher sanftere Töne und passend zur griechischen Mythologie. Nach erfolgreichem Abschluss eines Levels folgt die obligatorisch heroische Musik. Mythologische Figuren des antiken Griechenlands finden sich auch immer wieder in den Leveln und dienen hier dazu gewisse Hürden einzubauen, welche den Schwierigkeitsfaktor erhöhen. Dabei gilt: Je weiter man kommt, desto mehr Hürden und desto schwieriger wird es. Auch die verschiedenen Schwierigkeitsgrade machen sich durchaus bemerkbar, weil der Zeitdruck steigt!  

[b]Fazit[/b]

Mit fünf bis zehn Stunden Spielzeit bietet das Spiel kurzweiligen Zeitvertreib. Es ist aber nicht mehr als ein Gelegenheitsspiel - ein äußerst erfolgreiches wie ich hinzufügen möchte, denn es ist durchdacht, schön gestaltet und macht daher Spaß. Die 2,99€ sind also gut investiert und das Spiel eignet sich auch hervorragend für kleinere Kinder (>8 Jahre), die so spielerisch an die griechische Mythologie herangeführt werden können. Wem das trotzdem zu viel ist, der sollte einen Sale abwarten oder bis es in einem Bundle (bisher 12x enthalten) angeboten wird.

39531908.review: 挺好玩的小游戏，而且常年打折，没事玩玩挺放松心情的~

40967830.review: This game surely got my attention, what a great game to build & collect stuff, recommended its really worth its cost.

40947258.review:
[h1][u]The following review applies to all games from the "12 Labours of Hercules" series.[/u] Even though they have different themes, they all have the same gameplay style and overall quality.[/h1]

[b]The "12 Labours of Hercules" series has extremely captivating resource-management games, with beautiful and enjoyable graphics, sound effects and soundtrack.[/b] Even though they are casual games, they offer some challenge if played in difficult mode. [b]The achievements are relatively easy to get[/b] - by the time you finish the game, you'll probably have gotten them all, or at least have just a couple to complete.

An interesting factor is that [b]with each new title in the series the developers seem to add and improve game mechanics.[/b] Although they have a "background story”, the narrative is very simple and each title has its own theme, so [b]there is no need to play them in any specific order.[/b]

[b]The cost benefit of the games is very good, since in addition to all having cards, they are also pretty cheap.[/b] So far there are 7 games in the series, costing $ 2.99 each or $ 16.73 for the complete pack. Since most of them have been in several bundles and frequent sales, it is quite easy to get them for less than "full price".

[i]*Personally, I recommend buying the complete pack during the big sales (Summer Sale and Winter Sale, around June and December), and you don’t even need to pay the full price if you already have some of the games.[/i]


[quote][b][i]PORTUGUÊS[/i][/b][/quote]

[h1][u]A análise abaixo se aplica a todos os jogos da série “12 Labours of Hercules”.[/u] Apesar de terem temas diferentes, todos possuem o mesmo estilo de jogo e qualidade geral.[/h1]

[b]A série “12 Labours of Hercules” contém jogos de gerenciamento de recursos extremamente cativantes, com gráficos, efeitos e trilha sonora bonitos e agradáveis.[/b] Mesmo sendo jogos casuais, oferecem certo desafio se jogados no modo difícil. [b]As conquistas são relativamente fáceis de conseguir[/b] – quando você terminar o jogo, provavelmente o terá “platinado”, ou terá apenas uma ou outra conquista para alcançar.  

Um fator interessante é que [b]a cada novo título da série os desenvolvedores parecem adicionar e melhorar mecânicas de jogo.[/b] Apesar de terem uma história de “pano de fundo”, a narrativa é bem simples e cada título tem seu próprio tema, então [b]não há necessidade de jogá-los em uma ordem específica.[/b] 

[b]O custo benefício dos jogos é muito bom, pois além de todos terem cartas, também são bem baratinhos.[/b] Até o momento existem 7 jogos na série, custando R$ 6,29 cada, ou R$ 35,21 o pacote completo. Como quase todos estiveram em vários bundles e promoções frequentes, é bem fácil consegui-los por um valor menor que o “preço cheio”. 

[i]*Pessoalmente recomendo comprar o pacote completo durante as grandes promoções (Promoção de Verão e Promoção de Inverno, no meio e no fim do ano), com a vantagem de não precisar pagar o valor integral caso já possua alguns dos jogos.[/i]

40947020.review: Fajn hra za 1e, která nenadchne, ale taky nezklame, prostě fajn hra na relax.

40934347.review:
-Appropriate for ages 5-10 years old.
-Fairly short.
-Boring, more of the same for every level, very little challenge.
-Has a mobile game feel to it, and yet has a clean indie polish.
+Cute music & sound effects.
-Along the lines of a Clicker genre time waster.
-Game model does have some potential in making a great game, but this isn't a winner.
-Would not recommend as there are so many amazing games made in the last 30 years where your time & money are better spent.
-2/5 stars.

40871755.review: Wunderbarer Zeitvertreib. Spielprinzip ist einfach gehalten. Die Schwierigkeit steigt langsam. Grafik ist ansprechend.  Alles in allem ein sehr empfehlenswertes Game für zwischendurch.

40637178.review:
I have way to many games on steam and I'm trying to play a minimum of 1 hour in every game, afterwards I will write my review! 

12 Labours of Hercules is a pretty slow game as it seems its been ported over from mobile. It's mostly a clicker game but there are timed aspects to it which make it a little more fun and once you beat the stage there is a minigame where you can fight a boss. If you like to watch videos and play games this is the game to do it.

40602210.review: Reminds me of the older games that a played as a kid with wildtangent.  Essentially what should be freeware nowadays.  It is cheap,  but since it does cost money advertising inside of it is inexcusable.  It's game play is simply you click places for your servants to go and they collect resources which you use to solve objectives.  The gameplay isn't terrible but I don't think any ads belong in a paid game.

40576443.review: Very polished time management genre game. Great graphics, sound, and music. Not diffcult at all and good for casual short burst of play. Variety of strategies needed in the fourth chapter is excellent. I am really looking forward to other installments and see what improvements the developers have made.

40529406.review: 12 Labours of Hercules is a pretty good casual game. The gameplay is straightforward but reasonably challenging, and has just enough hook to make you want to keep trying a level just one more time. The artwork is good and the interface is clean, even though it was clearly intended as a touch game for 99 cents in an app store. But that's all right, since that's about what it costs. It was good for the initial playthrough and still good for getting full completion, but not much replay after that (but that's just fine too). I'd recommend it to anyone looking for a casual puzzle game on the cheap.

40486039.review:
Бралась по скидкам для залипания во время обеденного перерыва и наудивление неплохо зашла. Неплохая убивалка времени.
+ачивки
+карточки
+со своей целью справляется неплохо(ненапрягающий геймплей во время обеда на работе)

40393746.review:
Im Allgemeinen mag ich Zeitmanagementspiele, obwohl viele Spiele dieser Art eher langweilig sind. Über "12 Hercules of Hercules" kann das aber nicht gesagt werden, denn dieses Spiel ist etwas Besonderes. Es ist ziemlich lustig, aber ich habe beschlossen, dieses Spiel zu spielen, nur weil mein Hund Hercules heißt.
Das Gameplay ist durchaus üblich, aber die Handlung ist sehr interessant.
Es ist notwendig, nicht nur über das Sammeln von Ressourcen zu laufen, sondern auch über die Strategie zu denken, um die Aufgaben so gut wie möglich zu erledigen, um innerhalb der begrenzten Zeit zu bleiben.
Sie müssen zweimal klug sein, um im schwierigen Modus zu spielen, da es eine echte Herausforderung ist.
Die Grafik des Spiels ist eher lustig und visuell angenehm.
Die Musik und das Rezitieren der Verse in alter Manier ist hinreißend, als ob uns ein richtiger alter Dichter diese Herkulesgeschichte erzählt.
Nachdem ich das Spiel einmal bestanden habe, habe ich beschlossen, es erneut zu spielen, um alle goldenen Sterne für jedes Level zu sammeln. Es macht mir wirklich Spaß.

40070555.review: if you need something slow paced instead of some FPS you may try this out. fun doesnt last long tho

40038127.review:
12 Labours of Hercules очень даже пригодная казуальная игра. 

С весьма красочной графикой и приятной медиативной музыкой.

Гейплей тоже вполне затягивающий. Заключается все это в сборе сыра, палок и укатывания валунов.
Рабочие хватают по одному предмету с дороги и несут домой натоскав сторйматериалов идут фермы  ̶м̶а̶й̶н̶и̶н̶г̶о̶в̶ы̶е̶ строить.
Пока работнички пашат как ишаки, сам же Геракл сидит как сыч ничего неделая вспоминая иногда о похищеной жене, и только при расчищенном гастарбайтерами от мусора пути, сожрав  голов 15 сыра как довакин, мчит к финишу пиная валуны и ломая морды боссам, кровожадный малый. Как  же я люблю боссфайты, даже такими казуальными остался доволен, на моей памяти тут были гидра, цербер, стимфалийских птиц еще по стрелял... и чтото еще несовсем похожее уже на боссов. Подвиги в этой части явно не все успел совершить.
 
Как и положенно для казуальный игры, она не сложная даже на харде, продолжительность невелика, часов 6~ на все 55 коротких уровня, со всеми достижениями на час-два побольше. Если же не успеет наскучить за это время, то это можно компенсировать множеством сиквелов, коих 6 штук. Я за пару дней на одном дыхании так 2 части прошел. 

Сюжета минимум. Про то как Геракл жену похищеную ищет. Между главами происходят сюжетные вставки с лайтовыми шутехами и кратким описанием, в Ру версии озвучанно стихами.

Стоит дешего, купив её на распродаже она у меня окупилась карточками.

8/10 для своего жанра если хочется не напрягая голову во что либо поиграть или просто убить время.

39808383.review: Un joculeț de management superb dacă ai vreo trei ore de pierdut și îți place să dai clickuri. Un Hercule care se odihnește toată ziua, și care are niște servitori care îl ajută să o salveze pe iubita lui. Îmi place grafica cartoonish, stilul amuzant și ritmul alert. Lovely stuff.

39620358.review:
Excellent jeu pour se détendre quand on a rien à faire.
Jeu de type point and click qui est vraiment sympa, il est simple a prendre en main, quelque fois un peu compliquer (mais ça reste quand même assez facile dans l'enssemble).J'ai fini le jeu en 5h30, pour un jeu qui coûte 3€ c'est vraiment cool.
Je le conseille fortement, si vous aimez un peu l'histoire et un peu la mythologie romaine (ou grecque j'ai oublié ^^').
Bon jeu a vous! ^^
